text: "Go Now" is a 1964 song by Bessie Banks and the best known version is The Moody Blues where it topped the single charts in the United Kingdom and also went to number 2 in Canada, number 4 in Ireland and number 10 in the Netherlands and the United States. Category:1964 songs Category:The Moody Blues songs Category:Paul McCartney songs Category:Simply Red songs
title: Go Now
